title: Error: Unable to generate text.
content: It suffices, indeed, if it is perceived in the immediate directness of its effects and within the human being. In Eastern disciplines, vital energy is called either prana or chi. The fluid is linked to the relevant person's vitality. Whoever recognizes it will be able to recognize life. It serves no benefit to discuss what it actually is. What matters is that one should recognize it. When it comes to knowing what it actually is, we are legitimately entitled to follow what Lao-Tse has to say: “Knowing not to know is the quality of the sage. Thinking that we know is a disease”. We do not actually know what this reality we call fluid, which is moreover augmented by developing one’s consciousness, precisely amounts to. Energy is natural.
